meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or exhibiting epinasty.
meanings.sent1: The epinastic leaves of the plant curled downward.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the epinastic growth pattern of the flower.
meanings.sent3: The epinastic vines seemed to be dancing in the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, like epinastic tendrils, cascaded down her back.
meanings.sent5: The epinastic petals of the flower unfurled in the morning sun.
